attributes.action: stop poor innocent animals being deprived of a good life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dogs are a mans best friend and should not be treat this way it is wrong and it must stop the cruel conditions make me sick i have dogs of my own and dont understand how people can do it they are loyal and would guard your life with thier own and do not deserve this please help stop the cruelty.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
